name: Levis 311 Shaping Skinny Jeans - Women's
description: Designed to lift, shape and lengthen. The 311 Shaping Skinny has that classic skinny jean silhouette that goes with everything.5-pocket layout for all your day-to-day necessities.Shapes through the hips and thighs for a flattering silhouette.Slimming front panel creates a flat tummy look.Comfortable stretch in the waistband moves with you.Skinny leg and mid-rise for the classic skinny jean profile.Levi’s sources more than 17% of its cotton through the Better Cotton Initiative (BCI). The BCI is a not-for-profit association committed to a holistic approach to sustainable cotton production.
